subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Duaner Sánchez’s journey back to the mound began in the wee hours of Aug. 1, 2006, after Sánchez separated his right shoulder in a taxicab accident near Miami.
snippet: The Mets’ Duaner Sánchez’s journey back to the mound began in the wee hours of Aug. 1, 2006, after Sánchez separated his right shoulder in a taxicab accident near Miami.
